Hero.long-text: Do you want a peaceful and relaxing holiday away from the crowds, but close to events, entertainment, delicious food, and top-quality wines that Istria offers? Here you can find the perfect combination of relaxation and enjoyment in everything Istria provides!

Second.opis-1: Do you want to enjoy a vacation in peace and seclusion from the rest of the world, yet be close to events, entertainment, and gastronomic and oenological hedonism
